```{r ocha_setup, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, cache=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library(ochathemes)
library(tidyverse)
library(humicons)
```

# `r humicons::hi("Cyclone", color = "#418FDE")`

We can use OCHA Humanitarian icons v2 directly in `rmarkdown` document or `ggplot2`

```{r, fig.show='hold'}
car <- get_humicon("Car")

ggplot(mtcars, aes(wt, mpg)) +
  geom_text(family = "Humanitarian-Icons-v02", label = car, color = "#418FDE") +
  labs(title="mtcars again, it seems") +
  theme_ocha_rc(grid="XY")

```
